signUp.title: Sign up for Aurum Core
signUp.instructions:
Enter an email and password
to create your account.
signUp.condition2: At least one number and one capital letter.
signUp.condition3: It should not contain special characters like |!¡¿?”!()/*-:;.
signUp.haveAccount: Do you already have an account?
signUp.enterValidPassword: The password must have the indicated format
signUp.duplicatedAccount: We detected a pre-registration for this email account, please try entering the password for this account or try a different email account.
signUp.otpLimitExceeded: You have reached the OTP code submission limit. Please try again later.
signUp.otpSendError: Error in sending the OTP code.

otpModal.sentEmailCode: We have sent a code to the mail
otpModal.sentPhoneCode: We have sent an SMS to the phone
otpModal.errorValidatingOtp: We were unable to validate the submitted code.

addressData.title: Data of your address
addressData.noticePrivacy: I have read and accept the

nipForm.title: Create your PIN
nipForm.instructions:
With your PIN you can authorize your
transactions within the application.
nipForm.condition2: You must not carry two consecutive numbers.
